messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Local groups
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 5/29/2003 2:51:01 PM Eastern Daylight Time, HMSL2@aol.com ... Yep. Evolved into a *%@*)&^$#$ing nation-wide thing, though---be careful! They
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 5/29/2003 2:51:01 PM Eastern Daylight Time, HMSL2@...
writes:
> Has anyone ever started a local group?
> Do you advertise as Unschoolers or Homeschoolers?
> Does anyone know what places usually let you use there buildings? I dont
> want
> to do ti at my house.
> Any suggestions?

Yep. Evolved into a *%@*)&^$#$ing nation-wide thing, though---be careful!
They grow to EMORMOUS proportions! <G>

Unschoolers, most definitely! Otherwise you get a bunch of weirdos!

Parks, libraries, Chuck E. Cheese (just an idea---I don't go there! <G>).
Parks are best. My house is the regular hang out.

~Kelly


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
